errors.error_description: In the command to delete cron jobs, `delete` is incorrectly passed as a flag (`--delete cronjob`). It should be a subcommand (`delete cronjob`).
correction_candidates: Replace `xargs kubectl --delete cronjob` with `xargs kubectl delete cronjob`.
Use a different command: `kubectl delete cronjob -l app=citationhunt`.
Change the command to `kubectl get cronjobs | xargs kubectl delete`.
Replace the entire pipe with `kubectl delete cronjob --all`.
errors.golden_answer: Replace `xargs kubectl --delete cronjob` with `xargs kubectl delete cronjob`.
